modName: Dwemer Centurion into Xmen Sentinel textures and sounds
summary: Replace the textures and some sounds of the dwemer centurion into the Sentinel of X-men
descriptionHtml:
this mod try to make the Dwemer centurion more like the Sentinels of the X-men, by a replacement of the textures, and making the sounds more mechanical.

I used the game x-men origins: Wolverine, Marvel vs Capcom 3, Deadpool, and the movie Terminator salvation.

mods used for screenshots :
Space Wiking X-Men - Wolverine : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16511/?
Blue Jeans Plus Volume 3 : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19644//?
The Mines Of Moria BETA (for the bid centurion) : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10493/?

I really don\'t know why I\'m doing this mod... I\'m just a big fan of Marvel, thats all...

Thanks Bethesda for Skyrim
Thanks Marvel for X-men and the Sentinels !
author: John33
